gloss: the part of the body between the neck and the upper arm
provide with a covering or cause to be covered
fill or meet a want or need
an architectural partition with a height and length greater than its thickness; used to divide or enclose an area or to support another structure

a human body (usually including the clothing) / bring down with a blow to the legs / kill by firing a missile / kill with or as if with a burst of gunfire or electric current or as if by shooting / provide with clothes or put clothes on / well-groomed and neatly tailored; especially too well-groomed
pluck or pull at with the fingers / sweep with a broom or as if with a broom / to grip, cut off, or tear with or as if with the teeth or jaws
bring order and organization to / put (things or places) in order / put in order or neaten
free from dirt or impurities; or having clean habits / neat and tidy / put in order or neaten
be on the defensive; act against an attack / to hold fast or prevent from moving / watch over or shield from danger or harm; protect
